steps.conclusion: The course title “Scientific Methodology” is somewhat nonstandard compared to typical academic field names, and some icon choices (e.g., “tabler-binary” for Computer Science) may not match standard tabler icons.

Consider replacing “Scientific Methodology” with a more canonical field like “Research Methods” or “Philosophy of Science,” refine icon selections to more common tabler icons (e.g., “tabler-code” for Computer Science), and possibly include additional specialized courses such as “Laboratory Techniques” or “Research Ethics.”
